title: Deprecate --manual flag with warning
description:
When user uses --manual flag, show deprecation warning and map to --awaiting work:

In ticks client wrapper or CLI handling:
```go
func handleManualFlag(cmd *cobra.Command) {
    if cmd.Flags().Changed("manual") {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, "Warning: --manual is deprecated, use --awaiting work instead")
        // Map to new field
        awaiting = "work"
    }
}
```

This is a soft deprecation - the flag still works but warns users to migrate.

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] --manual flag shows deprecation warning to stderr
- [ ] --manual maps internally to --awaiting work
- [ ] Existing scripts continue to work
- [ ] Warning message includes migration guidance
